name: NWTLSParameters
desc: TLS properties for creating a connection.

items.name: var tlsSessionID: Data?
items.desc: The Session ID to use for the associated TCP connection.

items.name: var sslCipherSuites: Set<NSNumber>?
items.desc: The set of allowed cipher suites when negotiating TLS.

items.name: var minimumSSLProtocolVersion: Int
items.desc: The minimum allowed SSLProtocol value to use when negotiating TLS.

items.name: var maximumSSLProtocolVersion: Int
items.desc: The maximum allowed SSLProtocol value to use when negotiating TLS.
